remarks.para: A minimum of fifteen static dischargers are required when operations are dependent upon ADF capability. Trailing edge or tip type dischargers must be installed in three of the five most-outboard positions on each wing, horizontal stabilizer/elevator assembly, and vertical stabilizer/rudder assembly.
Static discharges are not required when operations are not dependent upon ADF capability. (SEE FIGURE 23-61-1)
A performance penalty is not required if static dischargers are missing.
